description: Actually the place wasn´t so bad. Nice neighborhood - small gardens, nice houses. Today´s client seemed to have been sponsored by his parents who have money. However, for some reason he appeared to have come into financial trouble. And he borrowed a small sum from friends. And from his parents. But he was so afraid of them finding out that he called us instead of talking to them. So I offered him the money for free... well, not exactly for free of course. He first rejected - but then he admitted that he even had sex with a man before. And when he finally agreed into the deal he had such a boner... wow. So rich-mum´s son was secretly gay. And now even my bitch for an hour. I must admit that I usually prefer straight boys. But this one was a real turn-on for me.
title: Debt Dandy 96
